---
title: minus
description: Liquid filter that subtracts one number from another.
---

Subtracts a number from another number.

<p class="code-label">Input</p>
```liquid
{{#raw}}
{{minus {{4}} 2}}
{{/raw}}
```

<p class="code-label">Output</p>
```text
{{minus {{4}} 2}}
```

<p class="code-label">Input</p>
```liquid
{{#raw}}
{{minus {{16}} 4}}
{{/raw}}
```

<p class="code-label">Output</p>
```text
{{minus {{16}} 4}}
```

<p class="code-label">Input</p>
```liquid
{{#raw}}
{{minus {{183.357}} 12}}
{{/raw}}
```

<p class="code-label">Output</p>
```text
{{minus {{183.357}} 12}}
```
